attributes.action: Id like for war veteran Tom Moore who has raised millions nhs to be knighted.
attributes.additional_details: Because not only did this man serve his country, in a time our country is in tatters he managed to raise such a huge amount of money for the nhs who are keeping our country together their are people who have been knighted for much less and I believe he is more the deserving of it.
attributes.background: War vet Tom Moore raises so much money for the nhs in these difficult times I believe he should be honoured with being knighted.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
